title: Front-End Developer
content:
• Create and modify more than 80 websites about Australia vehicles using ASP.NET MVC3, MVC5 with jQuery, AngularJS
  • Create mail template for gmail and outlook
  • Create AMP page, Improve SE0 and page speed for a few website
  • Maintain and develop admin page using C# and AngularJS

title: Intern Front-End
content:
• Design and make a new CV template using HTML(HAML) and CSS(SCSS)
  • Improve Front-end of VietCV website
  • Create a new tips and fun fact for CV editor
  • Create a support laucher and working with backend feedback mail
